openl-remote.comment: RECOMMENDED: OpenL Tablets MCP Server via remote HTTPS using SSE transport. Replace <path-to-node> with your Node.js executable path (use 'which node' to find it) and <path-to-mcp-remote> with your mcp-remote executable path (usually in the same directory as node). Replace <your-pat-token> with your Personal Access Token from OpenL Tablets UI.

openl-remote-example.comment: Example configuration with nvm paths. Replace with your actual paths.

openl-local.comment: Local MCP Server via stdio transport. This connects directly to the MCP server process running locally. Replace <path-to-node> with your Node.js path and <path-to-project> with your OpenL Tablets project directory. Replace <your-pat-token> with your Personal Access Token from OpenL Tablets UI.

openl-local-dev.comment: Local development: MCP server connects to local OpenL instance. Replace <path-to-node> with your Node.js path and <path-to-project> with your OpenL Tablets project directory. Replace <your-pat-token> with your Personal Access Token from OpenL Tablets UI.
